name: Void (itch) (Stephcraft)
description:
Made for the Community Game Jam 2019 — 1 week.
My first game jam, tower defence game and completed game made with Unity.
Made by Stephcraft
Music by Sy-Klop BEATZ

Day 1 Brainstorming ideas Day 2 Pixel art & Run Unity Day 3 Development of Camera, Player, Enemy, Tower Day 4 Animation & development of Delta Tower, Raiders II & III Day 5 development of Omega Tower & debugging Day 6 UI & Main Menu Day 7 Dialogue system, Wave system, Boss Day 8 Polishing, itch.io setup & build Community

Join my Discord server!
